cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for the project
rem [button: Debug]
set LANG=zh_CN.utf8
jc --readable_c_code qpad.jc --run

# TODO LIST
on-the-fly finds overhaul
	don't reset the context on cursor move
		just extend the range
		have to reset on OnChange though
	highlight finds in scrollbar
		limit the amount of matches
emscripten
	platform-selective resources - CJK fonts
	use VBO / EBO instead of CPU pointers
smart code reference
	specify "training data" files
		same-git-same-ext files
	search for code snippets matching a current location
		fcall with similar args
		dot with similar names
jc: better completion - methods from unfamiliar class, unreached code, constants, ...
binary file speed issue?
new release
	linux source .tar.gz
		build-it-yourself release
multiple windows of the same file
full notebook search
tab switch
	to previously edited file?
		navigate backward - but it isn't reliable for this
	an option
save notebook wrapping status
links in help
running a markdown: open as help page?
drag-out support
	secondary windows
		rendering works as is
		region is mixed up
runtime completion
	Python / node.js
	actually run an interpreter session and dump the "require"d objects to a file
		security concerns...
maximizing notebooks
function hint on *existing* calls - which parameter are you changing right now?
indent
	auto detect space / tab indent
plugin loading
help
	image searching
	script error notification
dragging a window to occupy "tips" fully
code beautifier
	help code auto beautification
(test) proper FindClose for abandoned finder callbacks
notebook ctrl+m focus
diff / undo on reload
AC plugins
	tex ref
	bash
	js member name in certain strings
	--
	multi-source combination
		some candidates may smash a context
		put this in as a property of the candidates
tentative focus refresh: infinite loop risk
ctrl+d at EOL
dblclick at notebook eol
porting
	linux alt+tab
	linux instance detection
		int pid_file = open("/var/run/whatever.pid", O_CREAT | O_RDWR, 0666);
		int rc = flock(pid_file, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB);
		if(rc) {
		    if(EWOULDBLOCK == errno)
		        ; // another instance is running
		}
		else {
		    // this is the first instance
		}
	unix search path for jc
multiple tabs for the same file
	private sel / scroll
	use circled numbers for id?
ctrl+mousewheel
	per-tab scale? make it global
mouse centric interaction
	toolbar in menu bar
localization, theme
ctrl+g mode
	goto button to trigger it on the tophint
	need must-appear
short and simple theme color palette
put plugins in ~/.qpad
make top hint / notification dodge 
	MouseOver / cursor
swap ctrl+shift+v and ctrl+v?
binary editor reloading?
for() is not a function
fileindex gc vs parse queue
mac
	tooltip hotkey translation, zoom hotkey
mac application menu
rendering
	true AA for roundrect
git diff viewer
auto-include files
tex
	port more of deferred.qpadscript
	enabling/disabling plugins in menu
CJK PPM:
	work in conjunction with IME?
		could have blind prediction...
	iphone prediction isn't that useful
	--
	or LSTM
very narrow file list...
bad parser result after multiple saves
	could be diff tracker bug
binary editor
	duk buffer size limit
generic HTML rendering?
	cheerio - looks managable
	need module conversion: npm to duktape
		did it with browserify
		it magically works in duktape with a minor modification

cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for 'c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc'
rem [button: Release]
cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe

cells.m_text_in:
#!/bin/sh
#[button: Translate]
cd /c/tp/qpad/res
grep -ERoh text:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * > ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\._\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\)\\\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\.Format\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\), * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh tooltip:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh ,name:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
